i_country.question: Country where you want to apply for TTC

i_dates.question: TTC Dates for the country you wish to attend (from and To)

i_youthteacher.question: Are you an active ART EXCEL / YES Course teacher applying to become an Art of Living Teacher?

i_youthteacher_2weekttc.question: Have you completed a 2 week TTC before?

i_address_question.question: Please give details of the two week TTC you have completed

courses.question: Please list the Art Excel / YES courses that you have taught in the last 2 years

i_youthcoursedetails_participant_count.question: Number of participants on the course

i_course_wishlist_question.question: Which courses would you like to teach?

eval_teachers.question: Please list your evaluating Teachers (3 required)

i_part1_question.subtitle: Please list details of the first Art of Living Happiness Program/Part-1/Yesplus course that you attended

i_aom_question.subtitle: Please list details of the Art of Meditation (Sahaj Samadhi) course you attended

i_prettc_question.subtitle: Please list details of the Pre-TTC you attended

i_courses_attended.question: Please select any other courses you have attended

i_health_physician.question: If you are presently under the care of a physician, or have been recently hospitalized, please describe

i_health_psychiatrist.question: If you have a history of mental illness or are currently under the care of a psychiatrist, please describe

i_health_medications.question: Please list in detail any medications you are taking and their purpose

i_emergency_contact.question: In case of emergency, whom should we contact?

i_prereq1.question: You have been with Art of Living for at least one year

i_prereq3.question: It has been atleast 1 month since you completed Pre-TTC

i_prereq4.question: You do your home practice of Sudarshan Kriya EVERYDAY

i_prereq5.question: You attend local long kriya follow ups regularly

i_prereq6.question: You have completed the Art of Meditation Course and practice the Sahaj Samadhi Meditation technique for 20 minutes twice every day

i_prereq7.question: You have attended at least 3 Art of Silence Courses including one with Guruji (or 2 Art of Silence Courses if the course with Guruji was one week long)

i_prereq8.question: You have viewed Ashtavakra Gita, all 33 tapes.

i_prereq9.question: You have listened to all the Bhakti Sutras by the time you apply

i_prereq10.question: You have listened to all of the Patanjali Yoga Sutras by the time you apply

i_prereq11.question: You are fluent in English. You have practiced speaking in front of large groups and your accent is clearly audible

i_prereq12.question: You are a vegetarian for at least the last 6 months

i_prereq13.question: You are free from use of alcohol for atleast the last 6 months

i_prereq14.question: You are free from use of tobacco for at least 6 months?

i_prereq15.question: Are you free from use of recreational drugs for at least 6 months?

i_prereq_no_reason.question: If you have answered no for any of the mandatory pre-requisites above, please elaborate here for each such case

i_last1year_introtalks.question: How many intro workshops/info sessions have you organized and led in the past 1 year?

i_avg_introtalk_attendee_count.question: How many participants attended the intro workshops/info sessions on an average?

i_enrollment.question: How many NEW participants have you enrolled to an Art of Living/Yesplus/Happiness Program in the last 3 years?

i_enrollment_question.question: Please provide their names, email, city & state where they took the course:

enrolled_people.print_count_label: Total no of enrollments listed by candidate below (auto calculated)

i_new_format_course_organized_count.question: How many new format courses have you organized in the last 2 years as a lead organizer?

i_old_format_course_organized_count.question: How many old format courses have you organized in the last 2 years as a lead organizer?

i_new_format_course_assisted_count.question: How many new format courses have you assisted in the last 2 years as a lead organizer?

header_orgcourse.display_value: Please list all the courses that you have lead organized and/or assisted within the last two years

orgcourses.print_count_label: Total no of courses listed by candidate (auto calculated)

i_orgcourse_leadteacher.question: Lead Teacher Name and Contact info (email & ph. no.)

i_orgcourse_activity_question.question: Please check everything that you did for this course

i_orgcourse_activity_logistics.display_value: Ensuring that the room and the day-to-day logistics of the course are taken care of for all 5 days

i_orgcourse_activity_attend.display_value: Sitting through the 5 days of the course

i_orgcourse_activity_accounting.display_value: Completed the accounting withing 2 weeks of the course

i_orgcourse_team_member_names.question: Write down the names of your team members

i_orgcourse_team_member_inspiration.question: Explain in detail, how you inspired them to be part of your organizing team

i_orgcourse_outreach.question: Please explain in detail different modes of outreach you used for this course

i_orgcourse_introtalks.question: List the number of intro workshops/info sessions that you led for this course and how many people attended each of your introductory talks

i_orgcourse_enrollment_count.question: How many NEW participants did you register for this course? This means that either through your connections, intro workshop / info sessions and other outreach efforts, you directly inspired them and therefore they registered for the course on the Harmony/SAO

i_orgcourse_participant_count.question: How many total participants on the course?

i_orgcourse_processes.question: Please explain which processes you led? (e.g. Pranayamas, Yoga, Knowledge Points, Games, Other)

i_other_teaching.question: If you are involved in or practise or teach any other forms of self-development or spiritual practices outside of Art of Living please describe

i_habits.question: Do you have any habits of chewing tobacco/smoking/consuming alcohol/recreational drugs?

i_service_project.question: Please write about any Art of Living/IAHV/any other NGO service projects that you may have participated in or have affliations with

i_special_interest_groups_question.question: Are there special interest groups you would like to work with:

languages.question: List all the languages you can read, write and speak fluently in, including English. (Speak well enough to teach in)

i_skills.question: Briefly describe your skills and what you like to do. (For example: phone skills, taking care of people, organizing, IT, writing, singing)

i_post_teacher_volunteers.question: Write the names of the volunteers who will help you organize your courses after you have become a teacher

header_sincere_questions.display_value: Answer the following questions sincerely and honestly

i_why.question: Why do you want to become an Art of Living teacher?

i_moment.question: Describe that defining moment in your life when you made a conscious and purposeful decision to become an Art of Living Teacher. Describe the events that prompted that moment.

i_gurustory.question: Tell us your personal  story/experience of Grace/Guru that made your faith stronger.

i_guruvalue2new.question: How would you explain the value of having a Guru in one's life to someone new to Art of Living?

i_descyourself.question: Briefly describe yourself and what you are doing (working/studying) at present.

i_othersdescyou.question: How do your close friends and family describe your personality?

i_family.question: Share about your family (father and mother, siblings, partner / spouse, and children). Are they supportive of your journey in Art of Living?

i_2aolfchanges.question: If there were two things you could change in AOLF what would they be? How would you go about changing them?

i_favteacher.question: Who is your favorite Art of Living teacher? Why?

i_responsibilities.question: Describe your responsibilities both at home and work. Also, explain how you balance them to accomodate Art of Living service activities.

i_favkp.question: Which is your favorite Art of Living Knowledge point, something that you apply the most in your life? Using your personal examples, please establish that point in less than 200 words.

i_personal_changes_from_aol.question: Share specific personal benefits and positive changes you have observed in yourself since your first Art of Living Course.

i_anythingelse.question: Use this space for anything else you want to share with the TTC desk.
